scripts.clean: del-cli packages/*/node_modules packages/*/package-lock.json && npm run clean:styles
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:typescript -- --fix && npm run lint:lit -- --fix
scripts.start: npm run build:styles && node ./scripts/parseElements.js && tsc -b && concurrently --names "npm run watch:styles" "npm run watch" "web-dev-server --config ./web-dev-server.config.js"
scripts.build: npm run build:styling && npm run build:typescript
scripts.llint: npm run build:styles && tsc -b && eslint './demo/**/*ts' --ignore-path ./.gitignore -c ./.eslintrc.js --fix && lerna run lint
scripts.publish: npm run lint && lerna run build && lerna publish
scripts.build:demo: node ./scripts/parseElements.js && rm -rf ./docs && npm run build:styles && tsc -b && rollup --config ./rollup.config.js
